item.description:
Since last Saturday rained, this is take two!

NATIONAL RUN A MILE DAYs™ is a “youth and adult” fitness event sponsored by the American Running Association. The goals of the RUN A MILE event are to celebrate the mile and encourage people of all ages, especially children from elementary to middle school ages, to participate in running the mile. NATIONAL RUN A MILE DAY™ shall be a festive event that promotes the message that running can be fun and is an important aspect of overall health, fitness and well-being.

SO join the south shore fitness meetup group at Braintree High School to participate. If you are in our 5K training, or a runner already, or even a walker... join us at the track to get in some time.

We will meet by the bleachers at 10am to start and don't forget your water. :)

For more information on the event here is their website:
http://www.americanru...

Hope you'll join us!

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: National Run a Mile, Make up
